featured.text: The woman is so that she cries every time she hears a sad story.
To teach the monkeys how to make the loudest cries to scare people away. 44.
It may have got the baby to sleep, but its message is far from comforting: If he/she does not stop crying, the demon will eat him/her.

definition.en_def: To shed tears, often as an expression of emotion such as sadness or joy.
definition.example: The baby began to cry when it was hungry.
